template.description: Perform a syscall to exit the program (return code 0)
template.name: exit (syscall)

template.description: Perform a syscall to exit the program with a constant return code
template.name: exit with constant return code (syscall)

template.description: Perform a syscall to exit the program with a variable return code
template.name: exit with variable return code (syscall)

template.description: Perform a syscall to print a character to terminal
template.name: printChar (syscall)

template.description: Perform a syscall to print a string to terminal
template.name: printString (syscall)

template.description: Perform a syscall to print an integer to terminal
template.name: printInt (syscall)

template.description: Perform a syscall to read a single character
template.name: readChar (syscall)

template.description: Perform a syscall to read an integer
template.name: readInt (syscall)

template.description: Perform a syscall to read a string
template.name: readString (syscall)

template.description: Define a new unterminated string constant (ASCII)
template.name: .ascii

template.description: Define a new unterminated globally labeled string constant (ASCII)
template.name: .ascii (globally labeled)

template.description: Define a new unterminated labeled string constant (ASCII)
template.name: .ascii (labeled)

template.description: Define a new zero terminated string constant (ASCIIZ)
template.name: .asciiz

template.description: Define a new zero terminated globally labeled string constant (ASCIIZ)
template.name: .asciiz (globally labeled)

template.description: Define a new zero terminated labeled string constant (ASCIIZ)
template.name: .asciiz (labeled)
